VoteVerifier

helios_verifier.verifiers.VoteVerifier.verify_vote(election, vote)

Verifies a vote by iteration through all questions. For each question, a 0…max zero-knowledge proof is performed via verify_disjunctive_0_max_proof() for every possible answer (choice) of the question. An overall-proof is then performed on the homomorphic sum of all the ciphertexts. :param election: election to verify the votes for :param vote: CastVote of a voter that is to be verified :return: bool indicating whether the verification succeeded or not
